description.narrative: The project's development objective is to support improved performance in the planning, delivery and sustained provision of priority municipal services and infrastructure by urban local governments.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Urban Development, Housing, and Construction

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Sect. I, D5(b) | Description :The results of the annual performance assessment by the independentevauators shall be incorporated into the Annual Performance Report to submitted by MWUD to IDA | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Sect. V, A | Description :UCDBO shall carry out a Project Implementation Capacity Assessmentsatisfactory to IDA & prepare necessary prog. of support | Due Date :07-Jul-2008

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Sect. V, B | Description :UDCBO shall have furnished to IDA the list of Project coordinators for eachULG, who shall be designated by, & report to, their resp. Mayor's office, as satisfactory to IDA | Due Date :07-Jul-2008

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Sect. V, C | Description :The govt shall have ensured that the ULGs and MWUD shall have each preparedand subm to IDA a work program to carry out internal audits of its resp. project funds, as satisfactory to IDA | Due Date:31-Dec-2008

Finance Agreement :Sched. 2, Sect.I, D5(a) | Description :MWUD shall hire a team of independent evaluators to carry out annualperformance assessment of each eligible ULG to evaluate the performance grant target & indicators | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Improved latrines constructed under the project

comment.narrative: 75 latrines have been constructed between the start of the project and end of EFY 2002(FY 10)
87 additional latrines have been constructed up to the reporting period.

title.narrative: New cities meeting access criteria for a potental second ULGDP

comment.narrative: Indicator is new
The recent APA verified that 26 new cities have qualified to benefit from ULGDP II. 18 cities are getting TA by the firms hiredandthe rest 8 cities are being supported by GIZ.

title.narrative: ULGs that achieve annual targets specified in ULG revenue enhancement plans (Number that achieve an 85% increase at the end of calendar 2014)

comment.narrative: project effectiveness date
19 cities meet 85% of their target
10 cities met 85% of their annual target for FY 14.

title.narrative: Urban Local Governments prepare annual finacial reports on time and as per required format ( number)

comment.narrative: All cities have submitted IFRs on time.

title.narrative: Each ULG prepares and adopts a revenue enhancement plan.

comment.narrative: 183 kms of roads are added 21.6km is gravel and the rest 161.5km is cobblestone.

title.narrative: ULGs that increase the number of citizen groups participating in the CIP planning process ( number achieving an 85% increase over the baseline)

comment.narrative: End of project target is 19 cities achieving 85% increase over the baseline
The target for this year was 19 cities achieving 85% over the baseline

title.narrative: Each ULG submits approved CIP with evidence of adequate participation

comment.narrative: All have submitted CIP for EFY 2006 ( FY 14), with evidence of participation
All participating cities have updated budget for EFY 2006-2008 (FY 14 to 16)

title.narrative: Infrastructure asset inventories updated annually indicating additional assets and condition of existing assets.
people in participating ULGs provided with acess to all season roads within a 500 mtrs range under ULGDP

comment.narrative: 1.5 million people
1.5 million people

title.narrative: ULGs using 75% of annual operations and maintenance budgets as specified in cities' CIPs

comment.narrative: 17 cities met 75 % of their annual target

title.narrative: ULGs producing timely external audit reports, which is either unqualified or qualified with minor comments

comment.narrative: 19 cities have audit report for EFY 2005 (FY13). All repots are qualified with minor comments. Only 5 ULGs have audit reports byJan 7, 2014

title.narrative: Drainage systems constructed under the ULGDP

comment.narrative: 58.9 kms of stretch added this year.

title.narrative: Improved community water points constructed or rehabilitated under ULGDP

comment.narrative: the target has been updated to reflect the current number (the target had been 10).
71 new water points constructed
of 2.5 million about 50% are female. This is 100% achievement.

title.narrative: ULGS disseminating information to the public on budgets(including investment plans), expenditures, physical progress of investments, and results of bid evaluation and contract awards)
people in urban areas provided with access to improved water sources under ULGDP

comment.narrative: the target has been updated to reflect the current number (the target had been 2500).
